[[File:Street in Iran.jpg|18px]] [[Shariati Street]] |junction= |terminus_b = [[File:Avenue in Iran.jpg|30px]] [[Pajoohesh Boulevard]] To [[File:Freeway in Iran.png|32px]][[File:Road2.png|13px]] [[Freeway 2 (Iran)|Tehran-Karaj Freeway]] |length_km= 18 |cities= [[Tehran]] |map= Hemmat Expressway map.png }} '''Shahid Hemmat Expressway''' starts from [[Pasdaran Avenue]] junction and goes [[west]]. It passes [[Shahid Haghani Expressway]], [[Kordestan Expressway]], [[Milad Tower]], [[Ashrafi Esfahani Expressway]] and [[Shahr-e Ziba]] in Western Tehran and Ends into a two way road that goes south to [[Freeway 2 (Iran)|Tehran Karaj Freeway]].
